title: Lost connection to game
body: Was in a normal, it is currently ongoing, and i cannot connect to chat or the game, this is not on my side as im on the internet right now.

replies.body:
Now I ain't no rocket surgeon but I'm guessing it's comcast. 

Same issue here. Oh on comcast too.



Oh if anyone is interested and is on comcast

http://downdetector.com/status/comcast-xfinity/map/
Share some details to help diagnoses issue. Are you guys using Windows 10. Are you part of the Insider Preview Program?

Windows 10, I dont know about insider preview program, I got stuck at the "IVERN" login screen and

Connection error
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.
Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.

What isp do you all have?
Comcast for me.
Comcast. I'm seeing issues on websites that are hosted on AWS (Amazon). Does Reddit work for you or another AWS hosted site?
Comcast here as well. Thankfully I just finished a game but Ive been unable to connect. the client will launch and it says server is up but it continues to time out.
Comcast for me too.

Comcast, I got stuck at the "IVERN" login screen and

Connection error
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.
Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.

So...if we were in a ranked game, like in my case where we disconnected during the loading screen, we lost LP for the leaverbuster.
Are we going to compensated or have this game nullified? I'm guessing not, but just the thought of bringing it up is nice.

It looks like there may have been some chat issues for some players during this time per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  I don't see anything currently, so everything looks okay now.  Let me know if you're still having issues.

Ok so my game bugsplatted 3 times while trying to get in game and after i tryed to re-log it said my files were corrup so i restored and then it gave me a leaverbuster so now i have to wait 20min for 5 games wtf any help plz

Ok so my game bugsplatted 3 times while trying to get in game and after i tryed to re-log it said my files were corrup so i restored and then it gave me a leaverbuster so now i have to wait 20min for 5 games wtf

Comcast is having problems nation wide

http://downdetector.com/status/comcast-xfinity
comcast here :(, maybe I should change to AT&T
I can log onto the EUW server just not NA
same connection issue here windows 10, comcast.
only one of my friends is playing with WIN 10.......
Was in a ranked game, the Jarvan got Killed and said "F This!" Then the game crashed. I thought for sure he caused it lol

Same problem. On comcast, reddit seems down as well but amazon works fine. On windows 7.
Lost connection in game, tried re-launching game. Got stuck on LOL logo before launcher could load. After 10 minutes the launcher loaded. Cant log onto server now

Of course i was about 1 minute away from a ranked win :/
dude same
Was in a game with a friend, both of us got disconnected. feelsbadman
Same here, i cant even open patcher, and if it lets me it wont let me log in.
Same, got booted from champ select and now can't load the client. Ping test shows Riot's server is down, so I imagine it's like that for everyone.
I can't even load the client for some reason...
similar issue. started a new game, once in the rift i d/c now i can't even get the client to open.
